description.value: HL7-defined code system of concepts used to define a type of range used in composite pricing in financial transacxtions. Used in HL7 Version 2 messaging in the CP datatype.

purpose.value: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0298 (CP Range Type)

copyright.value: This material derives from the HL7 Terminology (THO). THO is copyright Â©1989+ Health Level Seven International and is made available under the CC0 designation. For more licensing information see: https://terminology.hl7.org/license

description.value: Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated

display.value: Pro-rate. Apply this price to this interval, pro-rated by whatever portion of the interval has occurred/been consumed

definition.value: Pro-rate. Apply this price to this interval, pro-rated by whatever portion of the interval has occurred/been consumed

display.value: Flat-rate. Apply the entire price to this interval, do not pro-rate the price if the full interval has not occurred/been consumed

definition.value: Flat-rate. Apply the entire price to this interval, do not pro-rate the price if the full interval has not occurred/been consumed
